_comment: Duck Mini Configuration with Dual IMU Setup (BNO085 + ICM45686)
_hardware: PCA9548A multiplexer at 0x70, BNO085 on channel 1, ICM45686 on channel 0
_use_case: IMUs can be at different body locations (torso, leg, etc.) for independent measurements, or at same location for redundancy/comparison
_imu_selection: Choose 'bno085' or 'icm45686' or 'bno055' (legacy) - specify which IMU to use as primary
_fallback_note: imu_fallback is optional - only used for automatic failover if both IMUs measure the same body part

bno085_config._comment: BNO085 uses automatic dynamic calibration - no manual calibration needed

_icm45686_configuration: ICM45686 6-axis IMU with Madgwick sensor fusion

axis_remap._comment: Remap axes if IMU mounted in different orientation

joints_offsets._comment: Run scripts/find_soft_offsets.py to calibrate these values

_usage_examples.use_bno085: Set imu_type to 'bno085' to use BNO085 IMU
_usage_examples.use_icm45686: Set imu_type to 'icm45686' to use ICM45686 IMU
_usage_examples.compare_both: python3 scripts/test_dual_imu.py --compare (only if both measure same body part)
_usage_examples.multiple_locations: Connect each IMU to different channels, read independently in your code
